writeToParcel(android.os.Parcel, int).FullName: public void writeToParcel (Parcel parcel, int flags)

getDataTypes().Description: Returns all of the Fitness Platform data types supported by the device's Note that in some GATT profiles certain characteristics are optional. This method will return an optional data type even if the device doesn't support it. Registering to updates from a non-supported optional data type from a supported profile will succeed, but no data will be returned.

getName().Description: Returns the name of the BLE device, from @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothDevice#getName_E@.

getSupportedProfiles().Description: Returns a list of supported GATT Profile

getAddress().Description: Returns the address of the BLE device, from @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothDevice#getAddress_E@.

ClassDesc: Representation of a BLE Device (such as a heart rate monitor) that broadcasts information about its on board sensors. The BLE device supports one or more @B_com#google#android#gms#fitness#data#BleDevice#getSupportedProfiles_E@, which can be translated to one or more @B_com#google#android#gms#fitness#data#BleDevice#getDataTypes_E@.
